results.title: Targets
results.creator_credit: Peter Bogdanovich, Paramount Pictures and Saticoy
results.brief_description: The first feature of Peter Bogdanovich combines two seemingly unrelated plots. Plot one follows the depressed retiring horror film actor (Boris Karloff) and his despairing of the real horror of 60’s America. Meanwhile a lone sniper picks off strangers after coldly killing his parents and a delivery boy. The disquieting plots meet after tenion builds at a drive-in cinema. A tense and disturbing film. Cast also include Tim O’Kelly, Nancy Hsueh and James Brown.

results.title: The Day of the locust
results.creator_credit: John Schlesinger, Jerome Hellman, Long Road Productions and Paramount Pictures
results.brief_description: A scathing take on 1930s Hollywood motion picture industry, this film was only a moderate success at the time of release, despite garnering two Academy Award nominations. Adapted from Nathanael West’s novel the film principally charts the ambitions of Faye Greener (Karen Black), a talent-less starlet dreaming of fame, well beyond her grasp. In Faye’s orbit are Tod Hackett, a budding production designer and Homer Simpson, a wealthy suitor. Both men are driven mad by Faye’s excessive flirtations, yet stubborn unavailability. The narrative builds to a shocking climax. Music composed and conducted by John Barry.

results.title: Sweet talker
results.creator_credit: Michael Jenkins, Ben Gannon, New Town Films and New Vision Films
results.brief_description: Con artist Harry Reynolds is released from prison armed with his partners research for a new scam. Harry heads for the dying town of Beachport near the coast of Australia where he cons the locals into investing big bucks into his scam (the recovery of an old ship and the building of a theme park). Complications arise when Harry falls for the local hotel owner Julie and her young son David. Cast includes: Bryan Brown, Karen Allen, Chris Haywood, Bill Kerr, Bruce Spence, Bruce Myles.

results.title: The Sum of all fears
results.creator_credit: Phil Alden Robinson, Mace Neufeld, AZL Productions KG, MFP Munich Film Partners GmbH and Paramount Pictures
results.brief_description: Based on the best-selling novel by Tom Clancy with screenplay by Paul Attanasia and Daniel Pyne, this political thriller revives the tensions and paranoia of the Cold War era between the Americans and the Russians when the CIA suspect that Russia is once again involved in the development of nuclear weapons. Suspense and intrigue follow as a terrorist plot brings the two super-powers to the brink of nuclear war. Starring Ben Affleck as the rather young CIA agent Jack Ryan and Morgan Freeman as CIA Director William Cabot with James Cromwell, Liev Schreiber, Bridget Moynahan, Alan Bates.

results.title: Fallen
results.creator_credit: Gregory Hoblit, Charles Rover, Dawn Steel, Atlas Entertainment and Turner Pictures
results.brief_description: High budget supernatural thriller that sees Joe Hobbs (Denzel Washington) witness the execution of a serial killer. Things take a menacing turn when identical murders take place. It appears that a demon is passing through humans possessing them thus enabling the killer to continue with his murdering. Taunting the detective a twist at the end keeps the drama gripping. Police drama meets supernatural thriller. Cast includes John Goodman, Donald Sutherland and James Gandolfini.

results.title: The Blair Witch Project
results.creator_credit: Daniel Myrick, Eduardo Sanchez, Greg Hale, Robin Cowie and Haxan Films
results.brief_description: Presented as a documentary “The Blair Witch Project” tells of a group of students lost in the woods in search of the world of witchcraft. The story is told using the found documentary footage of the group recovered from the forest. Successfully creepy this low budget feature with jerky camerawork is understatedly disturbing.

results.title: Dazed and confused
results.creator_credit: Richard Linklater, James Jacks, Sean Daniel and Gramercy Pictures
results.brief_description: Taking place on the last day of school in 1974 this coming-of-age comedy drama is a interesting look at 70’s youth culture. From nerds to footballers this story follows students seeking fun involving the usual booze, drugs and parties within a random storyline. Not just the usual teen flick “Dazed and Confused” is seen as a realist portrayal of the teenage years where a party is the main destination. Cast includes Milla Jovovich, Jason London, Joey Lauren Adams, Ben Affleck, Matthew McConaughey and Parker Posey.

results.title: The Lawnmower man
results.creator_credit: Brett Leonard, Gimel Everett, Allied Vision, Fuji Eight, Lane Pringle Productions and New Line Cinema
results.brief_description: A brilliant scientist, obsessed with perfecting a revolutionary virtual reality software program, enlists the aid of a slow-witted gardener, only to encounter a shadowy group seeking to turn the “lawnmower man” into the ultimate weapon. Stars Pierce Brosnan with Jeff Fahey, Jenny Wright, Mark Bringleson, Geoffrey Lewis.

constellations_other.name: Future forward; cyberpunk manifestations, fantasy and world building
constellations_other.description: Science fiction and cyberpunk are often powerful projections of the future, which may act as dystopic warnings or strive for an optimistic outcome where societies rise above adversity.

results.title: Crooklyn
results.creator_credit: Spike Lee, 40 Acres and a Mule Filmworks, Child Hoods Productions and Universal Pictures
results.brief_description: Make yourself at home with the Carmichael family as they experience one very special summer in their Brooklyn neighborhood that they’ve affectionately nicknamed ‘Crooklyn’. Alfre Woodard stars as a loving, but fiercely independent mother who along with her musician husband Woody (Delroy Lindo) struggles to raise her family in difficult but often wonderful circumstances. Cast also includes David Patrick Kelly, Jose Zuniga, Isaiah Washington, Ivelka Reyes, Spike Lee, N. Jeremi Duru and Zelda Harris.

results.title: Cop land
results.creator_credit: James Mangold, Cathy Konrad, Ezra Swerdlow, Gary Woods, Miramax Films and Woods Entertainment
results.brief_description: Freddy Heflin is a simple, small-town sheriff whose life is about to change. After he uncovers evidence of murder, faked suicide and police tampering, Freddy must choose between the man he idolizes, the woman he adores and the law he’s sworn to defend. Cast includes Sylvester Stallone, Harvey Keitel, Ray Liotta, Robert de Niro.
